content:
Ukraine has returned home to nine other children in the mediation of Qatar.

About thisreportedHuman Commissioner for Human Dmitry Lubinets.

“Four of them - returned from Tot, five more - returned as part of the approved plan of action of the President of Ukraine Bring Kids Back UA. Today we have already met 3-year-old sisters, a 6-year-old boy and a 10-year-old girl in kindergartens who have been returned to the guardians and relatives to our office, ”he wrote.

The office also helped to reunite mom with a 12-year-old daughter.

The other four children who returned a little earlier to the child protection center have already said that some were forced to attend the Russian school. One of the returned girls with disabilities could not receive full medical care, so now in the territory controlled by Ukraine will finally receive proper assistance.

"Our joint work with other state bodies and through the mediation of the state, Qatar brings good results - children return to their native land," Dmitry Lubinets stressed.

As reported by the Armyinform, to the International Coalition for the Return of Ukrainian ChildrenjoinedAlready 33 countries.
title: Nine more stolen Russian children were returned to Ukraine through Qatar.
description: This was reported by the Commissioner of the Verkhovna Rada for human issues Dmitry Lubinets. “Four of them —...
author: Army Inform
